Scattershot:

Scattershot looked to DevilDuer.  "There is a crashed ship, Zardus wishes us 
to INSPECT it.  Come on and follow me.  We have orders to exterminate any 
Maximals on the way." smiling, Scattershot began to jog for where Ultra 
Optimus' craft had crashed.
